intent: Explore exit timing (hours->days) with graduated mode push. LIVE mild, PAPER stronger, SHADOW strongest.

baseline_current.description: No additional hold floor; preserve existing behavior (control).

live_50pct_push.description: Mild anti-churn: slightly longer holds + slightly reduced decay/displacement sensitivity.

paper_150pct_push.description: Meaningful patience: multi-hour holds; materially reduced decay/displacement sensitivity.

shadow_250pct_push.description: Aggressive exploration: long holds (24h default) and very low decay/displacement sensitivity.

shadow_3day_hold.description: Explicit 72h hold exploration for longer-horizon mean reversion / drift capture.

bear_regime_patience.description: Regime-aware: in BEAR, require longer holds (helps avoid chopping mean reversion).
